mcq.statement: Choose the CORRECT sentence: "The disexamined life" said Socrates is unfit to be lived by man., "The unexamined life", said Socrates, "is unfit to be lived by man.", "The unexamined life said Socrates", is disfit to be lived by man., The inexamined life, said Socrates, "is unfit to be lived by man

options.a: "The disexamined life" said Socrates is unfit to be lived by man.
options.b: "The unexamined life", said Socrates, "is unfit to be lived by man."
options.c: "The unexamined life said Socrates", is disfit to be lived by man.
options.d: The inexamined life, said Socrates, "is unfit to be lived by man
